name: ext_R2_DiagnosticOrder_item
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.DiagnosticOrder.item for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents DiagnosticOrder.item from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DiagnosticOrder|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: The specific diagnostic investigations that are requested as part of this request. Sometimes, there can only be one item per request, but in most contexts, more than one investigation can be requested.
element.comment: `DiagnosticOrder.item` maps to R3 `ProcedureRequest`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: A code that identifies a particular diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations, that have been requested.
